name: 4th World Congress on Surgery, Surgeons & Anesthesia
content: We are glad to welcome you at our new destination in London, UK on September 05-06, 2024 for our upcoming Event on 4th World Congress on Surgery, Surgeons & Anesthesia organized by Surgeons Congress 2024\. For More Details: https://surgeon.euroscicon.com/ The WCSSA 2024 has turned in to a premier forum to network, learn and connect with experts, academicians, researchers, specialists and activists in generating a platform to discuss and spread meaningful messages, values and practices in the subject of Surgery.
